sentences.en: " How could it make me tipsy, Pa?
sentences.cn: " 它怎能让我醉着呢, 爸?

sentences.en: " I can't see him plainly , but Pa says he can see me.
sentences.cn: 成渝说: “ 我也看不见爸爸.爸爸能看见我.

sentences.en: " In the name of Heaven, Pa, three thousand!
sentences.cn: " 爸爸, 我的天, 三千哪!

sentences.en: " Oh, Pa,'she said disgustedly, " you talk like an Irishman! "
sentences.cn: " 啊, 爸, " 她厌恶地说, " 你说这话真像个爱尔兰人哪!

sentences.en: " Pa, please ride behind us or in front of us.
sentences.cn: " 爸, 请你要么走在我们前头,要么在后面.

sentences.en: A voice came booming over the PA.
sentences.cn: 一个声音从有线广播里大声地传了出来。

sentences.en: Announcements were made over the PA.
sentences.cn: 通告是从广播系统播出的。
不要告诉妈,也别告诉爸.

sentences.en: Elvis comes on the coffee shop PA system.
sentences.cn: 咖啡店的广播中播放着猫王的歌。

sentences.en: I heard it on the PA.
I used to know your pa.
Pa used to be in the army.
Uncle, pa wants to see you.
What did Wade Hampton ever do for Pa?
sentences.cn: 韦德-汉普顿为我爸爸干过什么事?

trans.tran_cn: =Pennsylvania，=public-address system 扩音装置，扩音机，有线广播

trans.tran_en: electronic equipment that makes someone’s voice loud enough to be heard by large groups of people
